name: Shoppable Marketplace
author: Shoppable

sections.description: Shoppable’s patented, universal checkout plugin allows you to host a single multi-retailer shopping bag and marketplace on your website. Our technology transforms your content into Shoppable® content. This full-service e-commerce technology is used by everyone from bloggers to digital media companies to internationally known consumer companies. Now you can monetize your site through an e-commerce affiliate checkout without ever having to forward your reader to a retailers website. Click here to sign up for a Shoppable account, and then install this plugin to get started.
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate the Shoppable plugin from your Wordress Dashboard Plugins page.
  2. Sign up with Shoppable and get your token here.
  3. Enter your token and additional settings in the Wordress Dashboard Settings/Shoppable page.

After Activation

  1. You should see the marketplace in the element that you selected in the settings and the mini-cart tab should be visible in the top right corner of your page
  2. If desired, add additional CSS to the wp-content/plugins/shoppable/assets/css/marketplace.css file
  3. You’re done!
sections.faq:
You’ll find answers to many of your questions on Shoppable Documentation Page.

Installation Instructions

  1. Install and activate the Shoppable plugin from your Wordress Dashboard Plugins page.
  2. Sign up with Shoppable and get your token here.
  3. Enter your token and additional settings in the Wordress Dashboard Settings/Shoppable page.

After Activation

  1. You should see the marketplace in the element that you selected in the settings and the mini-cart tab should be visible in the top right corner of your page
  2. If desired, add additional CSS to the wp-content/plugins/shoppable/assets/css/marketplace.css file
  3. You’re done!
